about_the_game:
*Full Relayer game (sold separately) is required to access this content. Please update and install the most recent patch if necessary.

【Content Description】
A collection of three fully-voiced spin-off stories about the daily lives of the Asterism crew that are not included in the main story. Also unlocks the Azur's Battle Data+ custom chip, which increases SG earned.
After downloading, stories can be viewed in-game by going to "Ship" > "Space Science Library" > "Special".

【Episodes】
・Terra and Yodaka’s Gourmand Road Trip
・Space Gourmet (Star Council Edition)
・Stargazing

*Side stories can be viewed at any point during gameplay. Please note that they may include spoilers for the main storyline.

short_description: What is the daily life of the crew gathered at Asterism?　Enjoy the various expressions and episodes shown by the crew members in the fully voiced spin-off stories consisting of three parts!

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
